name: COLOR OF FORTUNE
description:
Directions: [Mouse Only] Clicking on left side of the screen makes the wheel rotate Counter Clockwise. Clicking on the right side makes the wheel rotate Clockwise.

Match the color on the wheel with the oncoming enemy color.

Click and Hold to stop the wheel from moving.

COLOR OF FORTUNE is a one button game developed with the CRISP game library. The music and sound effects are created by a random seed and by what appears on the screen, each run will sound a bit different.

CRISP Library: https://github.com/abagames/crisp-game-lib
